synonyms: kirīṭinam—adorned with a crown; kuṇḍalinam—wearing earrings; śaṅkha—conch; cakra—disc; gadā—mace; dharam—holding; śveta—white; utpala—lily; krīḍanakam—plaything; manaḥ—heart; sparśa—touching; smita—smiling; īkṣaṇam—and glancing.
translation: Adorned with a crown and earrings, He held His characteristic conch, disc and mace in three of His hands and a white lily in the fourth. He glanced about in a happy, smiling mood whose sight captivates the hearts of all devotees.
